policies.content: Note that if canceled, modified, or in case of no-show, the total price of the reservation will be charged.

block.name: King Studio - Flexible – modified - Increased flexibility

action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don’t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: Starting April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus. We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: Find a cancellation policy that works for you

hotel_name: Lyn House - Service Apartment Hoang Quoc Viet

hotel_text.important_information: In accordance with government guidelines to minimize transmission of the coronavirus (COVID-19), this property can only accept bookings from essential workers/permitted travelers on dates where such guidelines exist. Reasonable evidence must be provided on arrival. If it isn't provided, your booking will be canceled on arrival. In accordance with government guidelines to minimize transmission of the coronavirus (COVID-19), this property currently isn't accepting guests from certain countries on dates where such guidelines exist. In response to the coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are currently in effect at this property. Please inform Lyn House - Service Apartment Hoang Quoc Viet of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details in your confirmation. Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 1 day before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel within 1 day before arrival.

All children are welcome. Up to two children under 14 years stay free of charge when using existing beds.
Up to two children from 14 to 17 year are charged  VND 150000 per night when using existing beds.
There is no capacity for extra beds in the room.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 3.
There is no capacity for cribs in the room.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in the hotel rooms and is free of charge.
Free private parking is available  on site (reservation is not needed).
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price at any time.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. A City tax is not applicable. A Service charge is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.
A Service charge is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
